pullrequest.title: Model submission for X1 sensor configuration 1 from Team Explorer

content.raw:
The RGBD cameras are 320x240 in resolution. Their range is actually 300m. Setting the depth range to 5m would also affect the image range in that objects farther than 5m won't be visible in the rgb image. This is also true for all the RGBD cameras in X1-X4. So, we decided to set a range to 300m until the issue is fixed in the simulator.

The Lidar is correct.

I'll work on adding a gas sensor.
content.html:
The RGBD cameras are 320x240 in resolution. Their range is actually 300m. Setting the depth range to 5m would also affect the image range in that objects farther than 5m won't be visible in the rgb image. This is also true for all the RGBD cameras in X1-X4. So, we decided to set a range to 300m until the issue is fixed in the simulator.

The Lidar is correct.

I'll work on adding a gas sensor.
